When are voters going to get it?
They've got us fighting each other and we're still re-electing THEM?
You won't get term limits from incumbents.  You want change?  The Two Party System needs be changed like it's a fouled diaper. https://t.co/atae2J95Jy

But many of us have turned hard against freedom of speech.
So...?
